description:
Care Patrol (Senior Care Finders) exists to provide care options for seniors across America. We help families find assisted living, independent living, memory care, and in-home care. We review the care and violation history of the communities we work with. We tour our clients to the recommended facilities. 

Assistance is provided by:

* Helping to navigate the confusing landscape of Senior Care.
* Suggest payment assistance options.
* Suggest other senior options which may be needed. 
* Narrow the possibilities and when possible, send electronic referrals to the client with virtual tours of recommended properties.
name: CARE PATROL OF SOUTH FLORIDA IN MIAMI

contacts.name: Wendy Kirby, MBA, CMR, CSA, NRPC
contacts.title: Owner/Franchisee
